website_summaries.verdict: This call has a flexible bell to help you adjust your tone.
pros: Really brings in the geese and helps you bag your limit
Comes with a Realtree camo finish
Allows you to produce the sound of several geese
cons: The call has a tendency to be high pitched for inexperienced callers

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son to use. Gave him one of mine. This is a Cheap price of crap. Hard to blow. Best used as a Christmas ornament.
customer_reviews.author: DoubleLungBandit

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and price
customer_reviews.text: My nephew loves this! Sound is exact. Great quality and price
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth britt

customer_reviews.title: It is a great call for someone who is fairly new to the ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son-in-law who loves to hunt geese and duck. It is a great call for someone who is fairly new to the whole bird hunting thing. It is sturdy and works well.
customer_reviews.author: tammy beck

customer_reviews.title: crap
customer_reviews.text: Bought one and reed keeps sticking sounds like a broken goose. Junk,juck, and junk do not buy spend 10$ more and get something better.
customer_reviews.author: jonah porter

customer_reviews.title: I will be trying other brands to see if I can find a better match for my skill level
customer_reviews.text: I have trouble producing realistic sounds with this call, most likely operator error on my part. I will be trying other brands to see if I can find a better match for my skill level.
customer_reviews.author: Milt Wick

customer_reviews.title: High Pitch
customer_reviews.text: Very high pitched and easy to call. It is acceptable for the price but not a great deal. This call would be good to use along with others in your hunting group.
customer_reviews.author: Ethan

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: Works as described. Awesome to call geese after you practice a little. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Rick B.

customer_reviews.title: hard to blow
customer_reviews.text: very hard to blow. sound isnt great. would spend a few extra dollars for something better if i had to do over
customer_reviews.author: Adam h

customer_reviews.title: I want my call back
customer_reviews.text: Very difficult for a beginner. Bought for my wife and we switched calls because this one is so difficult to use requires a large amount of air forced over the Reed to make any sounds.
customer_reviews.author: mathew w.

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: sounds great. ready to call in some geese next season
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: Does not sound good at all way better calls out there for the same price. Go witH the goozilla call
customer_reviews.author: nathan  bass

customer_reviews.title: ontario goose caller
customer_reviews.text: can't wait to try this out on a flock of Canadian geese. looks great and sounds good I have other flextones calls and they all work great easy to learn on
customer_reviews.author: tom pinder

customer_reviews.title: He loved it.
customer_reviews.text: My husband almost cried. I have been listening to honking, whistling, and a dozen other sounds for hours now. It arrived quickly. He picked it right up and started producing authentic calls immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Gypsyblle

customer_reviews.title: Kids toy
customer_reviews.text: This is hard to use takes a lot of air to make a noise and when you do sounds nothing like a goose guess my 1 year old can use it as a chew toy
customer_reviews.author: jeremy p.

customer_reviews.title: Not a goose call it is a duck call
customer_reviews.text: I’m very not appreciative of the name because it is not a flex tone Canada goose call it is in fact a mallard duck call but besides wthat is is a good product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This call is horrible at first I thought I was calling wrong then I had 2 well experienced goose callers try it, and they said this call is junk do not buy!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: MR.556

customer_reviews.title: Great call
customer_reviews.text: This call is very easy to blow, and the first time I used it I had great success calling in geese. It is also reasonably priced. I would highly recommend it to anyone looking for a good call that doesn't break the bank.
customer_reviews.author: David Boggio

customer_reviews.title: DONT BUY
customer_reviews.text: It is the worst call I have purchased, it is very hard to use and sounds nothing like a goose!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very high pitched honk is produced. You can produce ...
customer_reviews.text: Very high pitched honk is produced. You can produce a decent honk however it is high pitched and not a consistent call. Would not tell anyone to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Goose call
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it! Easy to use and durable enough for an 8 year old to use in the field!
customer_reviews.author: JAB

product_meta.title: Flextone Team Realtree Canada Goose Call
product_meta.description: The flextone team Realtree Canada Goose call features our innovative design which makes it easy to master a full range of natural sounding goose calls. The flexible bell means improved control of tone, volume, and backpressure, allowing the user to produce the sound sof multiple geese and double cluck with ease.
feature_bullets: Innovative design makes it easy to master a full range of natural sounding goose calls.
Improved bell means improved control of tone, volume, and backpressure.
Allows the user to produce the sounds of multiple geese and double cluck with ease.
Be prepared for some close encounters.
